body: @Wyverald Seems related to your WORKSPACE changes

issue.title: Take defaults into account for "canonical reproducible form" diff

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps

repository.name: bazel

body:
@fmeum looks like rules_python still shows:

```
DEBUG: Repo 'rules_python++python+python_3_12_aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu' indicated that a canonical reproducible form can be obtained by dropping arguments ["url", "_rule_name"]
DEBUG: Repo rules_python++python+python_3_12_aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu defined by rule python_repository in @@rules_python+//python/private:python_repository.bzl
```

issue.title: Fix more issues with reproducible attr suggestions

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
* Ignore implicit attributes as well as the `name` attribute.
* Ensure that default values are treated as if no attribute was specified in all cases.
* Enforce that keys in the resolved attrs dict are strings. This is technically an incompatible change, but doesn't seem risky at all in practice.

Fixes #26561
